1370: Verthwi moved to Die lange straet3.D.2 after marriage.
Got married to Butsel at age 15 in 1370.
Gave birth to Itsburgis in 1370 at age 15.
1371: Gave birth to Suaneka in 1371 at age 16.
1372: Gave birth to Helyana in 1372 at age 17.
1374: Gave birth to Uergina in 1374 at age 19.
Lost daughter Itsburgis when Itsburgis was 5 years old.
1379: Lost daughter Saswe when Saswe was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Saswe in 1379 at age 24.
1383: Gave birth to Cofte in 1383 at age 28.
Lost daughter Cofte when Cofte was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1384: Gave birth to Aleydis in 1384 at age 29.
1386: Gave birth to Hille in 1386 at age 31.
1392: Gave birth to Goneir in 1392 at age 37.
